displayName.japanese: 最初の青いボールを救え

description.brazilian: Guarde a primeira bola Azul na caixa
description.english: Keep the first blue ball in the box
description.german: Bewahre den ersten blauen Ball in der Kiste auf
description.japanese: 最初の青いボールを箱の中に入れてください
description.schinese: 将第一个蓝球放入盒子中

displayName.japanese: 最初の赤いボールを救え

description.brazilian: Guarde a primeira bola Vermelha na caixa
description.english: Keep the first red ball in the box
description.german: Bewahre den ersten roten Ball in der Kiste auf
description.japanese: 最初の赤いボールを箱の中に入れてください
description.schinese: 将第一个红球放入盒子中

displayName.japanese: 最初のグリーンボールを救え

description.brazilian: Guarde a primeira bola Verde na caixa
description.english: Keep the first green ball in the box
description.german: Bewahre den ersten grünen Ball in der Kiste auf
description.japanese: 最初のグリーンボールをボックスに格納する
description.schinese: 将第一个绿球放入盒子中

displayName.japanese: 最初の紫色のボールを救え

description.brazilian: Guarde a primeira bola Roxa na caixa
description.english: Keep the first purple ball in the box
description.german: Bewahre den ersten lila Ball in der Kiste auf
description.japanese: 最初の紫色のボールを箱に保管する
description.schinese: 将第一个紫球放入盒子中

displayName.brazilian: Guarde a Primeira bola de Ouro
displayName.japanese: 最初のゴールデンボールを救え

description.brazilian: Guarde a primeira bola de Ouro na caixa
description.english: Keep the first gold ball in the box
description.german: Bewahre den ersten Goldenen Ball in der Kiste auf
description.japanese: 最初のゴールデンボールを箱に保管する
description.schinese: 将第一个金球存放在盒子里

displayName.japanese: 2番目のゲートをクリアする

description.brazilian: Saia do segundo portão com todas as bolas
description.english: Leave the second gate with all the balls
description.german: Verlasse die zweite Tore mit allen Bällen
description.japanese: 2番目のゲートを全てのボールを持ってクリアする
description.schinese: 带着所有球离开第二道门

displayName.japanese: 3番目のゲートをクリアする

description.brazilian: Saia do terceiro portão com todas as bolas
description.english: Leave the third gate with all the balls
description.german: Verlasse die dritte Tore mit allen Bällen
description.japanese: 3番目のゲートを全てのボールを持ってクリアする
description.schinese: 带着所有球离开第三道门

displayName.brazilian: Termine a versão de acesso antecipado
displayName.japanese: 早期アクセス版をクリアする

description.brazilian: Parabéns por chegar até aqui, muito obrigado!
description.english: Congratulations on making it this far, thank you very much!
description.german: Herzlichen Glückwunsch, dass du es so weit geschafft hast! Vielen Dank!
description.japanese: ここまで到達できておめでとうございます！ありがとうございます！
description.schinese: 恭喜您完成这一步，非常感谢！

description.brazilian: Abra a porta para sair da caverna do segundo portão
description.english: Open the door to exit the second gate cave
description.german: Öffne die Tür zum Ausgang der Höhle des zweiten Tors.
description.japanese: 2番目のゲートの洞窟から出る扉を開ける
description.schinese: 打开门，离开第二道门的洞穴

description.brazilian: Fuja do labirinto do terceiro portão
description.german: Entkomme dem Labyrinth des dritten Tors.
description.japanese: 3番目のゲートの迷路を脱出する

displayName.japanese: どうしてこうなったの？

description.brazilian: Use o Tubo Transportador pela primeira vez no quarto portão
description.english: Use a traveling tube for the first time in the fourth gate
description.german: Benutze zum ersten Mal eine Reiseröhre im vierten Tor.
description.japanese: 4番目のゲートで初めて移動チューブを使う
description.schinese: 在第四道门中第一次使用移动管道

displayName.brazilian: Que tipo de segurança é essa aqui?
displayName.english: What kind of security is this here?
displayName.german: Was für eine Art von Sicherheitsdienst ist das hier?
displayName.japanese: ここの警備は一体何なの？
displayName.schinese: 这里的安保措施是怎样的？

description.brazilian: Passe pelo quebra-cabeça da estátua na segunda pirâmide do quarto portão
description.english: Go through the statue puzzle in the second pyramid of the fourth gate
description.german: Löse das Statuenrätsel in der zweiten Pyramide des vierten Tors.
description.japanese: 4番目のゲートの2番目のピラミッドにある彫像パズルを解く
description.schinese: 穿过第四道门第二座金字塔中的雕像谜题
